profile.title: Bayanan Mai amfani
profile.mustLogin: Dole ne ka shiga kafin ka ga saituna.
profile.allowExplicitContent: Bada damar abun ciki na batsa
profile.autoDeleteSeconds: Sakan kafin a goge ta atomatik
profile.saveError: Kuskure: Ba a iya ajiye saituna ba
profile.noPrivateKey: Babu maɓallin sirri a wannan na'ura don fitarwa.
profile.setBackupPassword: Saita kalmar sirri don ɓoye madadin:
profile.backupDownloaded: An sauke madadin da aka ɓoye.
profile.enterBackupPassword: Shigar da kalmar sirri na wannan madadin:
profile.importSuccess: An shigo da maɓallin sirri zuwa wannan na'ura.
profile.importFailed: An kasa shigo da maɓalli (kalmar sirri ba daidai ba ko fayil ya lalace).
profile.keysRotated: An ƙirƙiri sabbin maɓallan kuma an loda maɓallin jama'a.
profile.importKey: Shigo da madadin maɓalli da aka ɓoye
profile.keyDisclaimer: Maɓallinka na sirri ba ya barin wannan na'ura. Fitar da kwafin da aka kare da kalmar sirri domin dawo da shi a wata na'ura.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Kana kan Free — yi amfani da zaɓin Rana/Wata a ƙasa. Sabunta don buɗe ƙarin jigo.
profile.moonTheme: Yi amfani da jigon Wata (Tsakar dare)
profile.backupTitle: Madadin da aka ɓoye & Daidaita Na'ura
profile.backupDesc: Ƙirƙiri madadin maɓalli masu kariya da kalmar sirri, sannan dawo da su a wata na'ura don daidaitawa.
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Dumama idan app bai ke a gaba ba
profile.notifyOnCopy: Sanar da ni idan aka kwafe saƙarina
profile.followHint: Labaransu za su bayyana a ɓangaren Masu bi idan sun wallafa ga Masu bi (ko Jama'a).
profile.userNotFound: Ba a sami mai amfani ba
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Wani abu ya yi kuskure a wannan sashin.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Mika kiran shigowa da saƙonni zuwa wayarka ko imel ɗin da aka tabbatar. Kiran/saƙonnin fita na iya nuna lambar Chatforia ɗinka.

chat.selectPrompt: Zaɓi rubutu ko ɗakin hira don fara hira

status.filesNote: Fayil har zuwa 5. Tsohon ƙarewa awa 24.

auth.headline: Saƙonni masu tsaro, na duniya tare da fassara nan take
auth.description: Kare saƙo daga mataki zuwa mataki, fassara ta AI, saƙonnin ɓacewa, da kira muryar/bidiyo.

feature.encryption: Kare saƙo daga mataki zuwa mataki ta tsoho
feature.privacy: Sirri na farko. Bayananka naka ne.

auth.desktopTip: A kan kwamfutar tebur? Duba da wayarka don samun app ɗin.
auth.subhead: Saƙonni masu zaman kansu, da aka ɓoye, kuma ana fassara su — nan take.
auth.tip: Za ka iya amfani da Chatforia a kowace na'ura — ko kuma ka sauke app don mafi kyawun kwarewa.
auth.scanHint: Duba don sauke app ko buɗe a burauza.

press.title: ’Yan Jarida
press.contact: Don tambayoyin ’yan jarida, a tuntuɓe mu a press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Don tambayoyin ’yan jarida, tuntuɓe mu a press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia manzo ne mai tsaro tare da fassara nan take da ɓoyewa E2E, an tsara shi don sauƙaƙa tattaunawa ta duniya cikin sirri da sauƙi.
press.assetsText: Loguna, hotunan allo, da hotunan samfur (sunan nan ba da jimawa).

careers.title: Aikin yi
careers.intro: Ƙaramar ƙungiya ce muke gina manzo na duniya mai tsaro. Idan kana damuwa da ɓoyewa, samun dama, da kyakkyawan ƙwarewar amfani, muna son jin daga gare ka.
careers.openRoles: Guraben aiki: Injiniya (Cikakken tsari, iOS, Android), Samfuri, Tallafi.

about.title: Game da Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia manzo ne mai harsuna da dama, tare da ɓoyewa daga mataki zuwa mataki, fassara nan take, da kira muryar/bidiyo. Manufarmu: haɗa mutane — cikin tsaro, sirri, kuma a fadin harsuna.

values.privacy: Sirri na farko: E2E ɓoyewa ta tsoho.
values.access: Samun dama ga kowa: Fassara harsuna 100+ ta atomatik.
values.control: Ikon kai: Saƙonnin ɓacewa & alamar an karanta na zaɓi ne.

about.howDescription: Ana ɓoye saƙonni a na'urarka kafin su fita. Fassara, madadi, da daidaitawa an tsara su don rage abin da sabar mu za ta iya gani.

advertise.title: Tallata tare da Chatforia
advertise.description: Kai ga masu amfani da manzo masu himma da wurare masu kyau. Muna ba da baje koli, tallafin shafi, da tallan cikin gida. Masu biyan Premium ba sa ganin talla.

adsense.withPubId: A halin yanzu muna ba da talla ta Google AdSense. Idan kana son yin niyya ta Google Ads, yi amfani da lambar mai bugawa {{pubId}} kuma ka nemi wurin da aka sarrafa a raka'o'inmu a ƙasa. Akwai tallafin kai tsaye — yi amfani da fom.
adsense.noPubId: A halin yanzu muna ba da talla ta Google AdSense. Hakanan akwai tallafin kai tsaye — yi amfani da fom a ƙasa.

advertise.noPlacements: Babu wuraren talla da aka saita tukuna. Ƙara su a ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Yawan shiga akai-akai da tsayawa a UI na hira
why.brandSafe: Tsare-tsaren talla masu tsafta; iyakance maimaitawa cikin girmamawa
why.sponsoredMoments: Lokutan da aka ɗauki nauyi (mis., “Fara Hira”) akwai
why.deals: Ma'amaloli kai tsaye ko ta hanyar AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Na gode! Tambayarka na kan hanya. Za mu biyo baya nan ba da jimawa ba.
form.missingRequired: Da fatan a cika suna, imel, da saƙo.
form.successToast: Na gode! Za mu tuntube ka nan ba da jimawa ba.
form.mailtoInfo: Ana buɗe manhajar imel ɗinka don aika tambaya…
form.messageLabel: Faɗa mana game da kamfen ɗinku
form.messagePlaceholder: Manufa, kwanaki, KPIs, wuraren da kuke so…

legal.disclaimerStart: Ta hanyar tura wannan, ka yarda da

upgrade.title: Sabunta
upgrade.subtitle: Buɗe shirin da ya dace da kai: cire tallace-tallace da Plus, ko samu ƙarin fasali da Premium.

plus.title: Plus
plus.cta: Zama ba tare da talla ba

features.plusAll: Duk abin da ke cikin Plus

features.allPremium: Duk abin da ke cikin Premium
features.save25: Ajiye ~25% idan aka kwatanta da kowane wata

gettingStarted.title: Fara Amfani
gettingStarted.subtitle: Sabon mai amfani da Chatforia? Wannan jagora mai sauri zai nuna muhimmai don ka fara aiki cikin ƴan mintoci.

alert.text: Za mu ci gaba da faɗaɗa wannan jagora yayin da muke ƙaddamar da sabbin fasali. Idan wani abu ya ɓata, sanar da mu ta

section1.title: 1) Ƙirƙiri asusunka
section1.loginText: da asusun da kake da shi.

section2.title: 2) Fara aika saƙonni
section2.item1: Ƙirƙiri DM ko Rukuni ka aika saƙonka na farko.
section2.item2: Yi amfani da fassara nan take don hira a harsuna 100+.
section2.item3: Gwada saƙonnin ɓacewa da alamar an karanta a Profile → Sirri.

section3.title: 3) Ƙara ci gaba
section3.item1Part2: (Plus = ba tare da talla ba, Premium = dukkan fasali).
section3.item2Part1: Haɗa ƙarin na'urori ka saita madadin da aka ɓoye a

account.q: Ta yaya zan ƙirƙiri ko dawo da asusu na?
account.a: Sauke app ko yi amfani da yanar gizo, danna “Ƙirƙiri asusu”, tabbatar da imel/waya. Don dawo da asusu, yi amfani da “Ka manta kalmar sirri”.

privacy.q: Shin saƙonni ana ɓoye su daga mataki zuwa mataki?
privacy.a: Eh. Saƙonni da kira ana ɓoye su daga mataki zuwa mataki ta tsoho. Kai da mai karɓa kawai za ku iya karanta su.

translate.q: Yaya fassara nan take ke aiki?
translate.a: Kunna “Fassara ta atomatik” a Saituna → Salo & Harshe. Muna fassara a na'ura idan ana goyon baya, in ba haka ba ta API masu tsaro tare da ƙarancin bayanai.

contact.a: Tuntuɓe mu a support@chatforia.com. Ƙara hoton allo da sigar app ɗinka.

contact.title: Tuntuɓe mu
contact.successMsg: Na gode — ƙungiyarmu za ta amsa ta imel.
contact.errorSend: An kasa aikawa. Don Allah a aika imel zuwa support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Wannan Manufar Sirri tana bayanin yadda Chatforia (“mu”) ke tattarawa, amfani, da raba bayanai idan kana amfani da aikace-aikacenmu da sabis. Muna tsara Chatforia don rage abin da muke iya samu.

infoWeCollect.title: Bayanan da muke tattarawa
infoWeCollect.account: Bayanan asusu (mis., imel/waya) don ƙirƙiri da kare asusunka.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Abun ciki da aka ɓoye (saƙonni/kira) an ɓoye E2E; ba za mu iya karanta shi ba.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Bayanan gyara/amfani kamar bayanan kuskure, irin na'ura, ko ƙididdiga kaɗan don inganta aiki.

howWeUse.title: Yadda muke amfani da bayanai
howWeUse.provide: Bayar da sabis da kare shi (shiga, gano spam/abuse).

sharing.title: Rabawa
sharing.body: Ba ma sayar da bayanan sirri. Zai yiwu mu raba kaɗan da masu sarrafa bayanai (mis., tura sanarwa, ƙididdiga) a ƙarƙashin yarjejeniyoyi masu tsauri.

rights.title: Haƙƙinka
rights.body: Dangane da yankinka (mis., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), kana iya neman samun dama, gyara, gogewa, ko ficewa daga wasu sarrafawa. Tuntuɓa: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Ajiya & Tsaro
retention.body: Muna ajiye abin da ake buƙata kawai don aiki, kuma muna amfani da tsaro na masana'antu. Ba za mu iya warware E2E abun ciki ba.

children.title: Yara
children.body: Chatforia ba domin yara ƙasa da 13 bane (ko yadda dokarku ta buƙata).

changes.title: Canje-canje
changes.body: Za mu wallafa sabuntawa a nan mu kuma sabunta “An sabunta ƙarshe”.

intro.body: Ta amfani da Chatforia kana yarda da waɗannan Sharuɗɗa. Idan ba ka yarda ba, kar ka yi amfani da sabis ɗin.

accounts.title: Asusu
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Bayar da ingantaccen bayani kuma ka kiyaye bayanan shiga lafiya.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Kai kake da alhakin abin da aka yi da asusunka.

acceptableUse.title: Amfani mai kyau
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Kada a yi amfani da haram, cin zarafi, ko karya haƙƙi; babu spam ko cin zarafin kai tsaye.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Zamu iya dakatar/katsewa idan aka karya ƙa'idoji.

yourContent.title: Abun cikinka
yourContent.body: Kana riƙe haƙƙi a kan abunka. Kana ba mu haƙƙin da ake buƙata don aiki da sabis (mis., isarwa, ajiya, fassara).

disclaimer.title: Karin bayani & Alhaki
disclaimer.body: Ana bayar da sabis “kamar yadda yake” ba tare da garanti ba. Zuwa iyakar da doka ta yarda, Chatforia ba ta da alhakin illoli na kaikaice ko na sakamako.

changes.title: Canje-canje
changes.body: Zamu iya sabunta waɗannan sharuɗɗa; cigaba da amfani bayan sabuntawa yana nufin yarda.

doNotSell.title: Kada a Siyar ko Raba Bayanaina
doNotSell.body: Chatforia ba ta sayar da bayanan sirri. Mazauna California har yanzu za su iya tura buƙatu a ƙarƙashin CPRA ta maɓallin da ke ƙasa.

cookies.title: Saitin Kukis
cookies.body: Chatforia na amfani da ƙananan kukis (mis., zaman, tsaro). Ba ma amfani da kukis na talla na ɓangare na uku. Sarrafa kukis ta saitin burauzarka.
